name: Crystal Charge
description:
Use mirrors, portals, and other objects to direct energy particles into crystal balls in order to charge them. Take care not to let particles of different colours touch.

Might look and behave a bit strange in Safari browsers.

Any suggestions, bug reports, or other feedback is much appreciated. Never made a puzzle game before, so especially interested in how you find the difficulty.

Twitter: https://twitter.com/JordanReading_
Newgrounds version: https://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/770938

Music Credits
Main theme: Unnamed - ZapSplat
Title screen: Unnamed - ZapSplat
Sound effects: Assorted - ZapSplat
